courses.name: Independent Study-Service Learning
courses.description: Students participate in community service activities, attend regular meetings, conduct research, submit four journals, a short bibliography and a research paper on their service in the community

courses.name: Independent Study-Service Learning - Honors
courses.description: Students participate in community service activities, attend regular meetings, conduct research, submit four journals, a short bibliography and a research paper on their service in the community.

courses.name: MU Community Engagement Project
courses.description: The MU Community Engagement Project offers students the opportunity to engage in academically-based community services; project sections include tutoring and mentoring, public health policy and outreach, international services, and community development.

courses.name: MU Community Engagement Project - Honors
courses.description: The MU Community Engagement Project offers students the opportunity to engage in academically-based community services; project sections include tutoring and mentoring, public health policy and outreach, international services, and community development.

courses.name: MU Community Engagement Project - Honors/Writing Intensive
courses.description: The MU Community Engagement Project offers students the opportunity to engage in academically-based community services; project sections include tutoring and mentoring, public health policy and outreach, international services, and community development.

courses.name: MU Community Engagement Project - Writing Intensive
courses.description: The MU Community Engagement Project offers students the opportunity to engage in academically-based community services; project sections include tutoring and mentoring, public health policy and outreach, international services, and community development.

courses.name: Civic Leaders Internship
courses.description: Students in any major may enroll in 3-6 credit hour internships with state government offices and agencies.

courses.name: Civic Leaders Internship - Honors
courses.description: Students in any major may enroll in 3-6 credit hour internships with state government offices and agencies.
courses.prerequisites: consent and application required. Honors eligibility required

courses.name: Civic Leaders Internship - Honors/Writing Intensive
courses.description: Students in any major may enroll in 3-6 credit hour internships with state government offices and agencies.
courses.prerequisites: consent and application required. Honors eligibility required
